text: Dann Florek (born May 1, 1950) is an American actor. He is best known for portraying Police Captain Donald Cragen in both the Law & Order and Law & Order: Special Victims Unit television series. He was on Law & Order for the first three years of the show, and has been on Special Victims Unit since it began. Category:1950 births Category:American television actors Category:Living people
title: Dann Florek
